languages.text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each ally who is adjacent to {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}.
languages.original_text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} за каждого союзника на соседних клетках с {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добычей{/g}.

traits.locale_text: At the start of the Hunter's turn, they gain +2 MP for each ally who is adjacent to prey.
At the start of the Hunter's turn, they gain +2 MP for each ally who is adjacent to prey.

traits.locale_text: В начале своего хода охотник получает +2 ОП за каждого союзника на соседних клетках с добычей.
